atlantis.wxguiÂ¶

atlantis.wxgui subpackage contains some modules implementing pyAH graphic user interface using wxPython library.

Each gui element in atlantis.wxgui package is designed as generic components that can be used in further projects with no or little modifications.

Modules in atlantis.wxgui package:

atlantis.wxgui.hexmap Hex map canvas.

Contents of atlantis.wxgui package:

  • atlantis.wxgui.hexmap
    • HexMapWindow
